description: This easy recipe is great for an alfresco lunch or dinner. Simply chargrill store-bought zucchini slice and serve with garlic bread and our easy bean salad.
keywords: Zucchini slice,Zucchini,Quick & easy dinner,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy
name: Easy Charred Zucchini Slice With Tomato & Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g Woolworths crustless zucchini slice, cut into 8 pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Cook beans in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for 2 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Rinse under cold water. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat garlic bread according to packet instructions.

HowToTip.tipText: Baking paper ensures the zucchini slice doesn't stick to the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large chargrill pan over high heat. Brush zucchini slice with 1 1/2 tbs oil. Place a sheet of baking paper on chargrill pan (see Tip) and cook zucchini slice for 4 minutes each side or until charred and warmed through. Transfer to a serving platter. Discard baking paper.
Combine beans, tomato and remaining oil in a large bowl. Season. Scatter zucchini slice with basil and season with pepper. Serve with bean salad and garlic bread.
